title: Find the Missing Shipment
content:
's Gate in exchange for Tarenths. The narrator provides a brief explanation of Tarenths as currency used by the Zhentarim. With this knowledge, respond with:

You're Zhentarim. Your people deal in more than just 'baubles.' Many people lost their lives for those baubles. [Intimidation] Whatever your cargo is, I'll consider it as payment. I'll leave.

Opt for the first option, and Rugan will be impressed that you recognize their affiliation. He issues a mild warning not to interfere with Zhent bus
